Sample Entry: Discrete values: WL, WZ
Label: Record Type
Description: Identifies the type of location record (e.g., WL=Warehouse Location, WZ=Warehouse Zone). Part of the Item Location Master.

Sample Entry: Text/Mixed data. 63 unique values. Samples: P1, P1, CR, P1, P1
Label: Warehouse
Description: The warehouse code where this location exists.

Sample Entry: Text/Mixed data. 6929 unique values. Samples: 59, 44, 101201, 102839, 801452
Label: Location
Description: The specific bin, slot, or location identifier within the warehouse.

Sample Entry: Text/Mixed data. 6074 unique values. Samples: TESCO BOCHNIA                 , Billa                         , ROAN SUWA[KI                  , Logisticky a distributni park , Gospodarstwo Szklarniowe Skarb
Label: Location Description
Description: Description of the location, often used for zone names or specific area descriptions.

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Cycle Count Interval
Description: Cycle count interval or indicator for this location.

Sample Entry: Discrete values:           , -         , P1
Label: Location Profile
Description: Profile code defining characteristics of the location.

Sample Entry: Discrete values: N, P
Label: Location Type
Description: Classification of the location (e.g., P=Pick, B=Bulk, N=Normal).

Sample Entry: Constant value of ' ' for all entries
Label: Alternate Location
Description: Pointer to an alternate location if this one is full or unavailable.

Sample Entry: Constant value of ' ' for all entries
Label: Location Status
Description: Current status of the location (e.g., Active, Blocked, Hold).

Sample Entry: Constant value of '    ' for all entries
Label: Location UOM
Description: Unit of measure restriction or default for this location.

Sample Entry: Constant value of '               ' for all entries
Label: Dedicated Item
Description: The specific Item Number if this location is dedicated to a single item. Blank for general locations.

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Pick Sequence
Description: Sequence number used to order picking paths through the warehouse.

Sample Entry: Discrete values:    , 100, 101
Label: Zone
Description: The zone within the warehouse that this location belongs to.

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Volume Capacity
Description: Maximum volume capacity of the location.

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Weight Capacity
Description: Maximum weight capacity of the location.

Sample Entry: Discrete values: 0, 1, 10, 1000, 3000
Label: Container Capacity
Description: Maximum number of containers/pallets this location can hold.

Sample Entry: Constant value of '  ' for all entries
Label: Dimension UOM
Description: Unit of measure used for the capacity dimensions.

Sample Entry: Discrete values: N, Y
Label: Allow Allocation
Description: Flag indicating if inventory in this location can be allocated to orders (Y/N).

Sample Entry: Constant value of '2' for all entries
Label: Forward Location
Description: Indicator if this is a forward picking location (vs. reserve/bulk).

Sample Entry: Constant value of '0' for all entries
Label: Last Cycle Count Date
Description: The date when this location was last cycle counted.
Keywords: date; cycle count; last; timestamp; audit
